summary: All four requested UI changes appear to be implemented: New Game is moved above Last Number with a Yes/No confirmation dialog, Last Number display is resized smaller, the draw button label is changed to “Draw Number”, and Undo is moved below the Number Board and removed from the controls card. However, the diff also includes additional unrequested theming/layout changes (e.g., global styles/Tailwind config updates and moving the NumberBoard out of the main 3-column grid).

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual theme changes (warm amber/orange palette, background pattern overlay) beyond the requested control reordering/label changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not ask for app-wide theme changes; only specific UI placement/label/size adjustments were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Layout change placing the NumberBoard outside the main grid (below the 3-column layout), not just moving the Undo button.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-15 requests only moving the Undo control below the Number Board; it does not request relocating the Number Board itself in the page layout.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a dedicated NewGameControl component with icon styling (RotateCcw) rather than just repositioning an existing control.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-12 asks to move the New Game control and preserve confirmation behavior, but does not require creating a new component and adding an icon; this is additional implementation not explicitly requested.
